SEARCH
Package app.apollo.server

Class AuthProvider

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
app.apollo.server.AuthProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthService, Serializable, Remote
public class AuthProvider extends UnicastRemoteObject implements AuthService
Remote implementation of the AuthService interface.

This class delegates authentication operations such as login, logout, registration, and token validation to an internal AuthProviderManager.

Exposed as an RMI service for remote clients.

See Also:
